Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Amazingly cute place in the centre of Amsterdam. Beer for reasonable prices and a wide variety of drinks available. Not very suitable for groups that have more than 5 people. The christmas decorations are really cool and the crazy amounts â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Incredible selection of rums.  Might be easier if they had some sort of menu though.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Unfriendly people... I have never been so badly recieved in a place and I still don't know why. Don't disturb the cat or the boss will bite you! Don't disturb the boss or the waiter will bite you! Don't disturb the waiter and go in another friendly bar. There are so many in the lovely Amsterdam.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Holy booze selection! This is the most stocked bar I've seen. Great staff and fun decor.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Amazing rum selection, amongst other spirits if your into trying new stuff. Best place for selection I found.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Amazing staff! While on a girls trip we realized we were being followed and jump into this place. When I told the person working there he went and guarded the front of the restaurant while the men following us circled the place and then left. Spent the rest of the night there having drinks and getting tips from the owner.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: This place is seriously so cute! Whenever I've been there it was never crowded, nice, chill atmosphere and good service (rare in Holland). We go there because it's so quiet and relaxed even though it's a busy area. â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text:
Authentic bar specialised in rum and wine with skilled and friendly staff
It has over 500 different kinds of rum from all over the world and if you like a good glass of affordable quality wine then this is one of the few cafes in â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: The atmosphere here is really great. The people behind the bar are always friendly and know how to make your evening even better. The prices are good, especially for this location. This is a bar which is great for us local Amsterdammers as well as tourists as it is not too touristy and truly brings the spirit of Amsterdam across.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: We stopped by to sit and have a drink and watch the people of Amsterdam walk by. Had a wine and a beer (from the excellent Dutch brewery of Broweurij TJ.. hope I got that right!). Service is of the norm you expect in a big city, I particularly liked the interiors though, had a lot of character.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Nice staff, quick service, good prices, great burger.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
Review Text: Stopped in for a drink with my boyfriend and had a very unpleasant experience. Owner/employee was very uptight and unwelcoming, he practically shoved us out of the door when we were just trying to have a relaxing drink. Thought the decor/atmosphere was quirky but it was ruined by the bad experience. Wouldn't go back!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© 't Spui -tje
